title: Configure audit engine
content:
This section provides the information required to configure the audit engine.

To configure the functional aspects of the audit engine, you can update the property values. You can override the default values of the audit engine properties to suit your deployment needs. The audit database contains these properties in the audit_config table under the ASESYSTEM schema. You don't have to restart the audit engine after you update the property values as it gets refreshed periodically. The default refresh interval is 4 hours and this can be configured.

Audit engine configuration

The following table provides the list of audit engine configuration properties:

Attribute Type Default value Description
enable_audit_for_audit_server Boolean True If this attribute is present with value 'true', then the audit server accepts the audit events.
audit_server_config_refresh_interval Integer 14400000 This attribute controls the interval (in milliseconds) when audit server refreshes its configuration. The default value is 4 hours.
audit_server_idm_connect_timeout_interval Integer 1000 This attribute controls the time (in milliseconds) that the audit service waits when connecting to IdM before erroring out.
audit_server_supported_tls_protocol String TLSv1.3, TLSv1.2 The TLS protocol to use when establishing SSL connection.
audit_server_supported_ciphers String

TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,

TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,

TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,

TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,

TLS_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,

TLS_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,

TLS_AES_128_CCM_SHA256,

TLS_AES_128_CCM_8_SHA256

 The ciphers to use when establishing SSL connections.
